featured.text: Which season of the year serves as the setting of the poem?
Who is the author of the poem?
For a temporary escape, she joined a small writers’ group, in which each member was required to bring a story or poem for discussion.
This poem may be __________ in several different ways and each of them makes sense.

other.text: Which word in the poem is closest in meaning to sleep-song? 3.
Which word in the poem is opposite in meaning to running? 5.

definition.zh_def: 詩：一種以韻律和節奏表達情感或思想的文學作品。
definition.en_def: A poem is a literary work that expresses emotions or ideas through rhythm and meter.
definition.example: She wrote a beautiful poem about the changing seasons.
